kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Delete All Sessions
kw.doc: Removes all the session objects

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=demoqa, url=https://demoqa.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://demoqa.com/Account/v1/GenerateToken path_url=/Account/v1/GenerateToken headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '70', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"userName": "phuong.playwright001", "password": "PhuongNguyen@12345"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://demoqa.com/BookStore/v1/Books path_url=/BookStore/v1/Books headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VyTmFtZSI6InBodW9uZy5wbGF5d3JpZ2h0MDAxIiwicGFzc3dvcmQiOiJQaHVvbmdOZ3V5ZW5AMTIzNDUiLCJpYXQiOjE3Njg4OTEzNzB9.jYX11nxOp1Buvm5uuiuvpjQww7aKUKAqqaF-b57t_do', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '100'} body=b'{"userId": "f2971715-cab9-4084-8e33-2ea3eda2866d", "collectionOfIsbns": [{"isbn": "9781449331818"}]}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: document.getElementById("login").click() Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.
